constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 69 (Wednesday, April 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAYNE:
H.R. 2744.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to Article I, Section 8, Clause 15:
Congress shall have Power to provide for calling forth the
Militia to execute the Laws of the Union, suppress
Insurrections and repel Invasions
[Page H2056]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Hazardous Duty Pay for Frontline Federal Workers Act
